title: Job Definition
description: Defines the valid sequences of events that make up a job.

event.description: Definition of an audit event type

OccurrenceId.description: Secondary key to an event that appears more than once in a job

Application.description: The name of the issuing application.

SequenceStart.description: A flag denoting whether or not this event is the first event in a sequence

SequenceEnd.description: A flag denoting whether or not this event is the last event in a sequence

IsBreak.description: A flag denoting whether or not this event is used to break out of a control e.g. loop

DynamicControlName.description: The name of the control that is to be applied

DynamicControlType.description: The type of the control that is to be applied

UserEventType.description: The first user event type that the control operates on

UserOccurrenceId.description: Secondary key to an event that appears more than once in a job

PreviousEventName.description: The name of the previous event.

PreviousOccurrenceId.description: Secondary key to an event that appears more than once in a job

ConstraintDefinitionId.description: An identifier assigned to the constraint

ConstraintValue.description: The value associated with the constraint, e.g. XOR
